title: Nonlinear Realizations of Superconformal Groups and Spinning Particles
abstract: The method of nonlinear realizations is applied for the conformally invariant description of the spinning particles in terms of geometrical quantities of the parameter spaces of the one dimensional N - extended superconformal groups. We develop the superspace approach to the cases of spin 0, 1/2, 1 particles and describe the alternative component approach in the application to the spin-1/2 particle.
